local_intent: Perceive maroon_square, approach and align with 0.005 tolerance within 2000 ms, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Robot is already at a safe pre-approach height from prior steps
Gripper is open and workspace is reachable
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence: retry detection, then precise approach/align before grasp. Uses identical target and tolerance/timeouts consistent with GLOBAL_BT.
